theWidow:ConduitPower.NAME: Conduit
DESCRIPTIONS: Attacks deal bonus damage equal to #yWeb and reduce #yWeb by 1.

theWidow:AmbushPower.NAME: Ambush
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you played no Attacks this turn, Retain your hand.

theWidow:TranscensionPower.NAME: Transcension
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Transform all Status and Curse cards in your hand into Widow cards, then Upgrade all cards in your hand

theWidow:TransensionPower2.NAME: Transcension

theWidow:TranscensionPower3.NAME: Transcension
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of turn, choose 1 of 3 cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

The next #b%d Potions you use are used twice.

theWidow:ChemistryPower.NAME: Chemistry
DESCRIPTIONS: When you use a Potion, draw #b%d cards.

theWidow:ScrapperPower.NAME: Scrappy
DESCRIPTIONS: At end of turn, gain #b%d Block per debuff.

theWidow:SadisticIntentPower.NAME: Sadistic Intent
DESCRIPTIONS: On applying a debuff to an enemy, apply #b%d #yCaught.

theWidow:GashPower.NAME: Gash

DESCRIPTIONS: Deals #b%d less damage with Attacks. Reduced by half after every attack and every turn.

DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the next #b%d instances of HP loss by #b75%%.
